title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Ryan Garcia takes issue with Canelo
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Ryan Garcia takes issue with Canelo
description:
Chris is joined this week by the great writer and broadcast Corey Erdman and one of the top lightweight boxers, Ryan Garcia. Chris and Corey dive into if Ortiz is ready for a Terrance Crawford fight, and what should be done to make sure that fighters are safe in the ring. Later, Ryan Garcia stops by and has some strong words and feelings towards Canelo Alvarez.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
